content: **strong text**glenview is our 2021 giving back pattern all proceeds of the sale of this pattern will be donated to the cambridge food bank and food banks canada help us help others in our community this holiday season a simple top-down raglan pullover in a full range of size short-row shaping is included under the collar for a better fit this is the fingering-weight version of the southwood sweater finished chest measurement 20 22 24 26 28 30 32 34 36 38 40 42 44 48 52 56 60 64
